str2: Regarding as happy, blessed, or enviable. From makarizo; beatification, i.e. Attribution of good fortune.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.

str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
